page.title: 15Our View of Sutton on Sea.
page.content:
I think Sutton is a quaint and bustling village attracting many holiday makers.Before I came to Sutton I lived in Long Eaton.It was a busy market town.I didn't like it there because of all the petrol fumes.I prefer Sutton _{Matthew Lockley
I like most things in Sutton- all the shops, the paddling pool and the donkeys on the beach in the summer.It is nice to live in Sutton because all your friends are near.I think there should be more attractions.I wouldn't always like to live here as I would like a change _{Samantha Shave
I like Sutton because it is a quiet place.When I'm older I would rather see the rest of the world because Sutton is a nice place and there may be somewhere like it _{Rebecca French
